item.title: How to Protect Your Pets From Pollution
item.description: Wildfire smoke, lead paint and other environmental toxins are health hazards for animals, too.

item.title: We Tried to Reach Gazans We Interviewed Over Two Years of War. Here’s What Happened to Them.
item.description: We kept wondering: Did they find their missing relatives? Were they even still alive?
